mapper.insert: insert into crawler_data ( name, pice, url, create_time, update_time, code, code_id ) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
